item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:4, topic:275016”](i == 15721)

That is the ID of the item, in which you need to pickup. Check your pickup command to make sure it can support numbers that high, and that you added the model correctly.[/quote]

Woot i got it!
I got it before u posted, but yeah, I put in the wrong id of the item.
Thanks all for replying!

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

(i == 15721)

That is the ID of the item, in which you need to pickup. Check your pickup command to make sure it can support numbers that high, and that you added the model correctly.

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“coole210, post:2, topic:275016”]Your not supposed to pickup the model… you have to pickup the id of the weapon/armour…

GO TO YOUR class8.java FIND YOUR WEAPON/ARMOUR

if(i == 15721) // thats what you ::pickup.. { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 5693; // class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt181 = 1800; class8.anInt190 = 470; class8.anInt198 = 129; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 6982; class8.anInt200 = 6982; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = ":O:O:O";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A reward.".getBytes();[/quote]

tried that, still froze.
Is it supposed to be a specific # in the i == ##### or is it just supposed to be a random, made up number?

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @coole210 coole210
item.description:
@coole210 wrote:

Your not supposed to pickup the model… you have to pickup the id of the weapon/armour…

GO TO YOUR class8.java FIND YOUR WEAPON/ARMOUR

if(i == 15721) // thats what you ::pickup.. { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 5693; // class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt181 = 1800; class8.anInt190 = 470; class8.anInt198 = 129; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 6982; class8.anInt200 = 6982; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = ":O:O:O";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A reward.".getBytes();
